properties.description: A unique standard number or code that distinctively identifies the resource. Valid IID characters are limited to alphanumeric, underscore, hyphen, period, and parentheses.
properties.title: Identifier

properties.description: A unique standard number or code that distinctively identifies the resource. Valid IID characters are limited to alphanumeric, underscore, hyphen, period, and parentheses.
properties.title: IID Identifier

properties.description: The name by which the resource is formally known.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: An entity primarily responsible for the intellectual content of the resource.
properties.title: Creator

properties.description: The entity that published, printed, distributed, released, issued, or produced the resource.
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description: The entity that published, printed, distributed, released, issued, or produced the resource.
The date the object was issued. Prefer for formally published materials. For reformatted material, use the date of the source, not the digital version. Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date issued

properties.description: The date the object was created. Prefer for born-digital and unpublished or informally published materials. For reformatted material, use the date of the source, not the digital version. Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date created
Languages (!! This is Language in the FALSC Metadata Guidelines. !!)
Physical Description (!! This is format in the FALSC Metadata Guidelines. !!)

properties.description: A designation of a particular physical presentation of a resource, including the physical form or medium of material for a resource.
A summary, abstract, scope and content note, or other description.
properties.title: Abstract

properties.description: The geographic focus of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Geo/Spatial Coverage
Related items (!! This is Source in the FALSC Metadata Guidelines. !!)

properties.description: The URL or PURL of the resource.
properties.title: URL

properties.description: General information about the use and reproduction of the resource, including links to copyright information pages. For specific restrictions on access (e.g. "Restricted: cannot be viewed until 2010") use the Restriction on Access note.
properties.title: Rights

read.path: /mods:mods/mods:accessCondition[(node() and (@type='useAndReproduction' or @type='use and reproduction')) and not(@displayLabel='RightsStatements.org') and not(@displayLabel='Creative Commons')]

options.index: In Copyright - Rights-holder(s) Unlocatable or Unidentifiable ( http://rightsstatements.org/vocab/InC-RUU/1.0/ )
No Copyright - Other Known Legal Restrictions ( http://rightsstatements.org/vocab/NoC-OKLR/1.0/ )
